name: Untitled Midterm Game
description:
Don't use Safari!

Glitches exclusive to the HTML build:

1. Don't use Safari!

2. The full screen button, depending on your monitor's resolution, might cause a visual glitch too.(If unsure, don't use it)

3. Sometimes it will have a lot of lag during certain moments. I'm not sure its because of the font or that I'm using a high DPI screen.

Music From The Gardens Between by Tim Shiel. 

https://timshiel.bandcamp.com/album/glowing-pains-music-from-the-gardens-between

I don't have rights to it, this is a student project/assignment

Ver1.2.4

Decreased music volume

Takes less time to fully charge eyes, eyes last longer

Slight level change in eyes

Better Optimization

Ver1.2.3

Changed intro section

Added walls preventing softlock

No fog in last area

Larger visible mask

More tuning

Ver1.2.2

Tuned level design for maze and eyes.

Increased eye sight

Ver1.2.1

Tuned level design for intro.

Ver 1.2 - This will be the last update for now

Better performance optimization

Small load time optimization

Various color adjustments.

Slightly faster player speed

Small level changes

General Tuning

Added escape key

Ver 1.1

Redrew patterns some patterns to fit the atmosphere more 

Better optimization

Some small level changes
